options.name: Fledgling Heretic
options.description: You have honed your connection to the dark. Gain +1 skill with black magic.

options.name: Action : Tainted Steel
options.description: You touch a weapon and taint it with black magic. The first time each round that this weapon deals damage, the recipient of that damage must make an endurance check against half the total damage taken or gain the bleeding condition.

options.name: Reaction : Twisted Magic
options.description: In response to a spell or effect dealing divine or aether damage to any creature within a moderate (10 unit) range of you, roll a black magic check and convert that amount of the damage to dark. The rest of the damage is dealt as the original damage type and mitigated separately.

options.name: Dark Studies
options.description: Gain +1 skill with magic knowledge and +1 spell capacity.

options.name: Profane Lore
options.description: Gain +1 skill with academics. You automatically know if a creature, object, or location has been tainted by black magic by touching it with an action, and can identify the specific subschool.

options.name: Corrupted Soul
options.description: The effect of healing magic on you is reduced by half, but you gain +3 divine and +3 dark mitigation.

options.name: Skilled Heretic
options.description: Through dedication to the darkness, you have gained power. Gain +1 skill with black magic.

options.name: Daily Reaction : Soul Claim
options.description: In response to a living creature dying within a moderate (20 units) distance of you, restore all of your energy and then immediately take a full turn.

options.name: Action : Cursed Blast
options.description: You hurl a projectile of pure, dark energy at a target within a moderate (20 units) distance, by making a dark spell check as your attack. For each dice that hits, deal 4 dark damage.

options.name: Master Heretic
options.description: Your relentless training has resulted in +1 talent with black magic spells.
